select emp_id as empId, emp_no as empNo, emp_name as empName, mobile, sex, birthday, salary, dep_id as depId, homeplace from t_emp where emp_id=#{emp_id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_emp ( emp_no, emp_name, sex, birthday, salary, dep_id, mobile, homeplace ) values ( #{empNo}, #{empName}, #{sex}, #{birthday}, #{salary}, #{depId}, #{mobile}, #{homeplace} )
